availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James Dudley Baldwin (Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, laborer. Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky native. Married to Mary Brock Baldwin in Owen County, Kentucky, on June 21, 1865. Father of Luther Baldwin. Laborer in Gallatin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Laborer in Gallatin County in 1860. Farmer in Gallatin County in 1863. Farmer in Gallatin County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 179B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 568.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Gallatin County, KY, July 1863, p. 40.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994051, Owen County Deaths.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Owen County Marriages, Film 000272776, p. 244-5.
